alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pueblo County through 500 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Pueblo Reservoir, or 14 miles west of Pueblo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... southwestern Pueblo and Pueblo Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Pueblo Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm, and strong, gusty winds can arrive well before any rainfall. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
